mapper.select: SELECT a.title ,b.board_file_no ,b.file_name FROM brd_reference_top a, brd_reference_top_file b WHERE a.board_no = b.board_no AND a.board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY b.board_file_no

SELECT board_no , category_id , getCodeValue('brd_ref_report', 'cate_code', category_id) category_id_nm , event_id , getCodeValue('brd_ref_report', 'event_code', event_id) event_id_nm , type_id , getCodeValue('brd_ref_report', 'type_code', type_id) type_id_nm , user_no , getTopMbrBscUserName(user_no) user_nm , title , contents , reg_ip , reg_date , DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(reg_date), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') reg_date_fmt , view_cnt FROM brd_reference_top WHERE board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY board_no DESC

SELECT board_file_no,board_no,file_path,file_name , reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(reg_date), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') reg_date_fmt , CONCAT(file_path, file_name) encodedFilePathName FROM brd_reference_top_file WHERE board_no = #{board_no} ORDER BY board_file_no
mapper.update: UPDATE brd_reference_top SET view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE board_no = #{board_no}
UPDATE brd_reference_top SET contents = REPLACE(contents,#{oldStr},#{newStr}) WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
